articles.description: The total assets under management (AUM) stood at  ₹16,89,318 crore, an improvement of 16.89% compared to the total AUM of  ₹14,45,172 crore reported in the same period last year.
articles.content: UTI Asset Management Company released its Q2FY24 earnings today, reporting a 9% decline in its consolidated net profit to 183 crore compared to the net profit of 200 crore recorded in the same period… [+2484 chars]

articles.title: Aadhaar Card Scam: Avoid Big Fraud, Lock It Before It's Too Late - Times Now
articles.description: A new scam has landed in the market of frauds, where scammers have found a loophole in the Aadhaar-enabled Payment System. The scam can lead your bank account to zero balance, without the scope of OTP authentication.
